segments.text: I observe the kitchen layout, with the sink on the right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman faces left, holding a plate and towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water runs from the faucet into the full basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It spills over, creating a sheet down the front.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A puddle forms on the floor near her foot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stacked dishes sit on the counter beside her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window above shows a neat garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains are tied back on either side.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: On the left, cabinet doors are open to the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy stands on a two-step stool, reaching inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He holds a plate in his other hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl nearby raises her arm toward the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The counter below is clear and empty.
segments.speaker: PAR
